markdown:
| icon           = poe2 rune_powder icon.png
| description    = While alchemists utilize knowledge of the mundane world to manufacture gunpowder, ambitious practitioners of magic have created an alternative. Rune powder, crafted through a process similiar to the techniques used to make grimoires, burns hotter and faster than black powder and is easier to ignite, making it more reliable, especially in inclement weather. For these reasons, it is exceedingly valuable, both to soldiers and sailors, who must often fire their weapons in the wet and cold.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Unequippable
| item_type      = Component
| item_category  = Ingredient
| requirements   = 
| is_soulbound   = no
| is_unique      = no
| value          = 40
| shop_value     = 200
| range          = 
| level1_spells  = 
| level2_spells  = 
| level3_spells  = 
| level4_spells  = 
| level5_spells  =

| level8_spells  =

| enchantments   = 
| rel_quests     = 
| rel_items      = 
| rel_abilities  = 
| rel_talents    = 
| internalname   = Part_Rune_powder
| location       = * [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/): Sold by [Cuitztli](/cuitztli/) in [Cuitztli's Exotic Herbs](/cuitztlisExoticHerbs/).
* [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/): Sold by [Fassina](/fassina/) in [The Dark Cupboard](/theDarkCupboard/).
* [Arkemyr's Manor](/arkemyrsManor/): In the locked armoire in Arkemyr's bedroom.
* [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/): Sold by [Tiabo](/tiabo/).
* Can be looted from dead [Engwithan saint](/engwithanSaint/)s.
| guid           =9aacb93a-e4b5-40db-9a3b-4cbdde2f18fd
}}
